definition: Mandarin (common language)/Putonghua (common speech of the Chinese language)/ordinary speech
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
Putonghua Proficiency Test, an official test of spoken fluency in Standard Chinese for native speakers of Chinese languages, developed in the PRC in 1994
pinyin: Pu3 tong1 hua4 Shui3 ping2 Ce4 shi4

sentences.english: Many employers also check whether potential hires can speak Mandarin.
sentences.chinese: 許多用人單位也會覈查應聘者是否會講普通話。

sentences.english: Hong Kong was suffering from a shortage of high-quality Putonghua teachers.
sentences.chinese: 香港缺乏高質素的普通話教師。

sentences.english: The compartment regulars between dialect and Mandrain are the important basis of dialect correctness.
sentences.chinese: 方言與普通話語音對應規律是方音辨正的重要依據。

sentences.english: Previously also speak Mandarin, Sichuan, guests hear the words, but also with soil any more.
sentences.chinese: 先前還講普通話，聽到客人是四川話，也用土話了。

sentences.english: Locke's (Mandarin) Chinese family name is Luo.
sentences.chinese: 如果按照普通話，駱家輝的中國姓爲駱。

sentences.english: Putonghua test is a kind of standard referential test.
sentences.chinese: 普通話水平測試屬於標準參照性考試。

sentences.english: But their dialects are distinctly different from Mandarin, the most-widely spoken language in China.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他們的方言跟中國最流行的普通話有明顯不同。

sentences.english: Tang poetry, for example, rhymes and sounds much better when read in Cantonese than in Mandarin.
sentences.chinese: 比如唐詩用粵語讀起來押韻和發音都比普通話好。

sentences.english: Fluency in Mandarin or Cantonese , well spoken English. Additional Asian language is advantage.
sentences.chinese: 能講流利普通話或粵語及英語，懂其他亞洲語言尤佳。

sentences.english: Who says Beijing dialect differences with Mandarin is not a good example to distinguish between southerners?
sentences.chinese: 誰說北京話與普通話的差異對南方人來說不太好分辨？

sentences.english: The native of Zhuzhou County have some difficulty in correctly pronouncing Standard Chinese consonants.
sentences.chinese: 株洲縣入學習普通話聲母有一些難點和失誤。

sentences.english: "Dao", inversion and arrival, is homophone in Mandarin Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 因爲在普通話裏“倒”和“到”是同音字。

sentences.english: Of course, these applicants must be able to communicate with other people in Chinese Putonghua, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說當然這些候選人必須具備能用普通話交流的能力。

sentences.english: The great importance of popularizing the common spoken Chinese in Zaozhuang-Tengzhou area is to distinguish between level-lingual and cacuminal.
sentences.chinese: 在棗滕地區推廣普通話，最重要的是分清平翹舌聲母。

sentences.english: How many grades does the Putonghua testing grade certificate have?
sentences.chinese: 普通話水平測試等級證書分爲幾個等級？

definition: Chinese language (Mandarin), emphasizing its national nature/Chinese as a primary or secondary school subject/Chinese in the context of the Nationalist Government/Guoyu, book of historical narrative c. 10th-5th century BC
unable to make sense of what one is hearing
